You can increase the level of the clan. To do this, you need the following:
1st level - [SP: 1,000, Adena: 150,000]
2nd level - [SP: 15,000, Adena: 300,000]
3rt level - [SP: 100,000, item: Proof of Blood x 100]
4th level - [SP: 1 000 000, item: Proof of Blood x 5000]
5th level - [SP: 5,000,000, item: Proof of Blood x 10000]
Proof of Blood - can be obtained by hunting monsters Torfe and Krator in Cruma Tower, Blood Queen in Dragon Valley.
